Dgame.Audio.SoundFile



struct SoundFile;
A helper struct for reading from a sound file.

char[4] type;
Sound type. e.g. 'wave', 'ogg'

string filename;
Sound filename

byte[] buffer;
Buffer

uint rate;
The sound rate

uint dataSize;
Total data size

ushort channels;
Number of channels

ushort bits;
Number of bits

ushort bytes;
Number of bytes

enum MusicType;
All supported music types.

None
For invalid types

Wave
Wave files

Mod
Mod -> TODO

Midi
Midi -> TODO

Ogg
Ogg or vorbis files.

Mp3
Mp3 -> TODO

abstract class BaseSoundFile;
The abstract basic class for sound file loading.

Author:
rschuett

this(string filename);
CTor

final void freeBuffer();
Free/delete the memory buffer.

final const pure nothrow ref const(SoundFile) getData();
Returns the SoundFile struct.

SoundFile struct

final const pure nothrow string getFilename();
Returns the filename of the loaded sound file.

const pure nothrow float getLength();
Returns the length of the sound in seconds.

abstract getType method.
